body_html:
Sorry, devel dockerfile does not build for 5.0 architecture that you have. If you are building docker image yourself, change the following line to include 5.0 architecture (you may comment out all the other architectures if it is only for this card). https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/Dockerfile#L29
Runtime dockerfile (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/docker/Dockerfile_runtime) installs binary package (currently .2) that should have been compiled with support for 5.0 architecture. Also, runtime image should be on the dockerhub.

Runtime dockerfile (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/docker/Dockerfile_runtime) installs binary package (currently .2) that should have been compiled with support for 5.0 architecture. Also, runtime image should be on the dockerhub.
body:
Sorry, devel dockerfile does not build for 5.0 architecture that you have. If you are building docker image yourself, change the following line to include 5.0 architecture (you may comment out all the other architectures if it is only for this card). https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/Dockerfile#L29
Runtime dockerfile (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/docker/Dockerfile_runtime) installs binary package (currently .2) that should have been compiled with support for 5.0 architecture. Also, runtime image should be on the dockerhub.
